thread.title: Bright Idea in Lady Lux (Christina Hanna)
thread.title_full: Bright Idea in Lady Lux (Christina Hanna)

title: Bright Idea in Lady Lux (Christina Hanna)
text: By Christina Hanna Oct 23, 2015 Hey...what's the bright idea?! We'll tell you...Lady Lux Designer Swimwear 2016 Collection. This collection is hotter than ever. We have TONS of bright luxury suits to settle your cravings to be the center of attention. You'll have EVERY eye on YOU in these fabulous suits.The Electro Lux pattern is one to write home about. These bright colors will have you feeling like it's summer even in the fall! If you're a fan of bandeau tops, this top is perfection. The sexy V in the middle is a great addition. And to cover up, throw on this bright and sexy kimono. The Rich And Pretty Yellow Rhinestone suit will match this collection as well! This suit is bright and beautiful.THink pink in these bright corals. We have a sexy Body Talk strappy suit! This suit is bright, and will have you feeling like Barbie. The Rich and Pretty suit is also a winner. If you're looking for something unique, try the Neon Kiss triangle color block bikini. This suit has zipper embellishments that add a little spice to the suit.Blues as bright as the ocean! The Rich and Pretty blue triangle top is a stunning color. It will match the beautiful ocean you are lying next to. The Waterfalls collection is also bright and beautiful! Try the monokini for some unique brightness.Hey...what's the bright idea?!
